description: This is an important bio-bibliographical account of ancient Greek as well as of Islamic physicians and scholars, continuing up to Ibn Abī Uṣaybi’ah's own day. It encompasses 380 biographies in fifteen chapters.
title: Kitāb ’Uyūn al-anbā’  fī ṭabaqāt al-aṭibbā’ (Important Accounts Regarding Classes of Physicians)
author: Ibn Abī Uṣaybi’ah, Muwaffaq (d. 1269 or 70)
